Flow.description: DATA QUALITY: Automatically updates the patient Account's Last_Discharge_Date__pc field whenever an opportunity's Discharge_Datecc__c is set or changed. Triggers after save when Discharge_Datecc__c changes to a non-null value. This keeps the Account-level last discharge date synchronized with the most recent opportunity discharge, which is used throughout the system for readmission calculations, patient history tracking, and determining if a patient qualifies as a first-time admission or readmission. Critical for maintaining accurate patient history at the Account level. Refactored from Case to Opportunity object.
Flow.label: Last Discharge Date (Opp)

recordUpdates.description: Updates the patient's Account record by copying the opportunity's Discharge_Datecc__c value to the Account's Last_Discharge_Date__pc field. This synchronizes the Account-level last discharge date with the most recent opportunity discharge, maintaining an up-to-date patient discharge history at the Account level. Used by other flows (like Set_Admission_Type_Opp) to calculate readmission status and days since last discharge. Critical for accurate patient history tracking across all opportunities.
recordUpdates.name: DC_Date_to_Account
recordUpdates.label: Copy Discharge Date to Account
